title: Mate Drink
description:
Mate is a caffeinated beverage popular in many South American countries. Green in color (from a key ingredient: the dried leaves of yerba mate) and consumed via a metal straw.

This drink is commonly referred to as yerba mate in English, and sometimes spelled maté (to distinguish from a mate, as in friend).
apple_vendor_description: The mate emoji on Apple devices depicts a steaming cup, showcasing Apple's attention to detail with its glossy finish and realistic texture. The dark, rich liquid is visible within the ceramic mug, accented by a subtle steam effect rendered with soft, translucent gradients. On Apple devices, this emoji evokes warmth, comfort, and the simple pleasure of a shared drink, often symbolizing a friendly invitation or a moment of relaxation.
